resources.string: This stylesheet has no rules defined. Add a rule to start customizing this stylesheet.
This stylesheet rule is already defined.
Apply rule to all target elements.
All possible values have been added.
This key code is already defined.
This key code is not valid. Ensure that the key code is within the range of {c_min} to {c_max} for characters or {i_min} to {i_max} for internal special keys.
Alternatively the following links will help you to find the corresponding key code:
To find the code of a key, use the button besides the code input field. Once activated, it will record the next key press and will insert the code into the input field.
{app_name} needs to be the default keyboard to record a key code
A property with this name already exists within the current rule.
No files have been added to this extension yet. Please use the "{action_title}" action in the previous screen to import files.
{app_name} can try to leniently load the stylesheet and add missing schemas, rules, or remove invalid rules, properties, or values. Do you want {app_name} to apply these changes?
Define variables within this rule to re-use common colors or sizes in your stylesheet.
Media emoji key popup extended indicator
Never play sounds for input events, regardless of system settings
Never vibrate for input events, regardless of system settings
This feature requires a hardware vibrator, which seems to be missing on this device
This feature requires hardware amplitude control support, which is missing on your device
This feature requires amplitude control support, which is only available on Android 8.0 or newer
Show a number row above the character layout
Shows a configurable utility key next to space bar
Show popup when you press a key
Adds symbol popups to the default layout\'s accents
Automatically switches back to characters when in symbols or numeric
Will show on top of the keyboard
Auto-expands/collapses the shared action row based on current state
Prevents possibly offensive words from being suggested while you type
Show inline suggestions provided by autofill services

string.name: setup__intro_message
string.comment: Short intro message welcoming new users

resources.string: Thanks for using {app_name}! This quick setup guides you through the required steps to use {app_name} on your device.
Android requires that every custom keyboard is separately enabled before you can use it. Open the System Language & Input Settings, there enable "{app_name}".
{app_name} is now enabled in your system. To actively use it, switch to {app_name} by selecting it in the input selector dialog!

As of Android 13+, apps must ask for permission to send notifications. In Florisboard, this is only used to open a crash report screen in the event of a crash. This permission can be changed at any time in the system settings.
{app_name} is now enabled in the system and ready to be customized by you.
If you encounter any issues, bugs, crashes or just want to make a suggestion, check out the project repository from the about screen!
Generate a backup archive of preferences and customizations
Restore preferences and customizations from a backup archive

This backup archive was generated in another version than current, which is generally supported. Be aware though that minor issues can occur or some preferences may not get transferred properly due to feature differences.
This backup archive was generated in a third-party app, which is generally not supported. Data losses may occur, restore at your own risk!
This backup archive contains invalid metadata. Either it has been corrupted or poorly modified. Restoring from this archive is not possible, please select another one.
This backup archive does not contain any files to restore, please select another one.
Sorry for the inconvenience, but FlorisBoard has crashed due to an unexpected error.

string.name: crash_dialog__report_instructions
string.comment: Issue tracker report instructions for the crash dialog. The %s placeholder is the name of the crash report template and always in English/LTR.

resources.string: If you wish to report this error, first check out the issue tracker on GitHub if your crash has not already been reported.\nIf it hasn\'t, copy the generated crash log and open a new issue. Use the \"%s\" template and fill out the description, the steps to reproduce, and paste the generated crash log at the end. This helps in making FlorisBoard better and more stable for everyone. Thank you!

string.name: crash_dialog__bug_report_template
string.comment: Name of the template to use in the GitHub issue tracker (is always in English)

string.name: ext__import__file_skip
string.comment: Label when a file cannot be imported in the current context. The actual reason string is in a separate text view below this string.

resources.string: File can not be imported. Reason:

string.name: ext__import__file_skip_unsupported
string.comment: Reason string when file is unsupported

string.name: ext__import__file_skip_ext_core
string.comment: Reason string when ext has core extension ID

resources.string: Unable to replace or update default extension packages provided with the app core assets. Consider updating the app itself if you intend to use a newer version of a core extension package.

string.name: ext__import__file_skip_ext_corrupted
string.comment: Reason string when file seems to be ext but is corrupted

resources.string: File appears to be an extension archive but parsing of the archive data failed. Either the archive is corrupted or this file is not an extension at all.

string.name: ext__import__file_skip_ext_incorrect_type
string.comment: Reason string when file is of incorrect extension serial type

resources.string: Expected an extension archive of serial type \"{expected_serial_type}\" but was \"{actual_serial_type}\".

string.name: ext__import__file_skip_ext_not_supported
string.comment: Reason string when file is loaded in incorrect context

resources.string: Expected a media file (image, audio, font, etc.) but found an extension archive.

string.name: ext__import__file_skip_media_not_supported
string.comment: Reason string when file is loaded in incorrect context

resources.string: Expected an extension archive but found a media file (image, audio, font, etc.).

string.name: ext__import__error_unexpected_exception
string.comment: Label when an error occurred during import. The error message will be appended below this text view

resources.string: An unexpected error occurred during import. The following details were provided:
Package name does not match regex {id_regex}
Please enter at least one valid maintainer
Please enter a component ID matching {component_id_regex}
Your component label is quite long, which may lead to clipping in the UI
Please enter at least one valid author
The stylesheet path must not be blank
Please enter a valid stylesheet path matching {stylesheet_path_regex}
Please enter a valid variable name matching {variable_name_regex}
Please enter a valid color string
Please enter a positive number between 0 and 100
Any value above 50% will behave as if you set 50%, consider lowering your percent size
Since this app does not have Internet permission, updates for installed extensions must be checked manually.
All tasks related to importing, exporting, creating, customizing, and removing extensions can be handled through the centralized addon manager.
You can download and install extensions from the FlorisBoard Addons Store or import any extension file you have downloaded from the internet.
Are you sure you want to delete \"{name}\"? This action can not be undone once executed.
Are you sure you want to reset \"{name}\"? This action can not be undone once executed.
Are you sure you want to discard your unsaved changes? This action can not be undone once executed.

string.name: general__example_given
string.comment: This string is used where an example will be inserted in the {example} block. When translating, use the abbreviation used in your language for 'example given'.

resources.string: No browser app found for handling URL {url}
Enable Capslock by double tapping shift
Switch to the next capitalization step each time the shift key is pressed
Always show the keyboard after closing any editor dialog
Never show the keyboard after closing any editor dialog
Only show the keyboard after closing any editor dialog if it was previously visible
Language names across the app and keyboard UI are displayed in the locale which is set for the whole device
Language names across the app and keyboard UI are displayed in the locale referred by itself
Automatically reorder emojis on emoji usage. New emojis are added to the start.
Automatically reorder emojis on emoji usage. New emojis are added to the end.
Do not automatically reorder emojis on emoji usage. New emojis are added to the start.
Do not automatically reorder emojis on emoji usage. New emojis are added to the end.

string.name: enum__emoji_suggestion_type__leading_colon__description
string.comment: Keep the :emoji_name while translating, this is a syntax guide

resources.string: Suggest emojis simply by typing the emoji name as a word
Places the extended actions row between the app UI and the candidate row
Places the extended actions row between the candidate row and the text keyboard
Places the extended actions row as an overlay above the app UI, without affecting the resulting keyboard UI height. Note that this placement may cause the app input field to be partially overdrawn

{app_name} directly interacts with the default hardware vibrator. This gives more control over duration and strength of a vibration, but the vibration may not be as smooth and optimized as using the haptic feedback interface

{app_name} uses the haptic feedback interface to trigger a predefined vibration sequence for key presses. This may work exceptionally well on some devices, but completely fail or perform very poorly on others
The initial character selected after long press is always the primary accent, or the hint symbol if no primary accent is available
The initial character selected after long press is always the hint symbol, or the primary accent if no hint symbol is available
The initial character selected after long press is dynamically decided to be either the primary accent or the hint symbol, based on the current language and layout
Replace shared actions toggle icon with the incognito indicator
Display the incognito indicator behind the keyboard
Incognito mode will always be disabled, regardless of the target app\'s passed options. The incognito quick action in the Smartbar will not be available with this option.
Incognito mode will always be enabled, regardless of the target app\'s passed options. The incognito quick action in the Smartbar will not be available with this option.

Recommended option. Incognito mode will be dynamically enabled or disabled either through the target app\'s passed options or by manually toggling it through the incognito quick action in the Smartbar.
Dynamically play sounds for input events, depending on system settings
Always play sounds for input events, regardless of system settings
Dynamically vibrate for input events, depending on system settings
Always vibrate for input events, regardless of system settings
Shows only the candidate row, without any action row/toggle or sticky action
Shows only the actions row, without the candidate row or an explicit sticky action
Shared toggleable candidate and actions row, with sticky action
Static candidate row and additional toggleable action row, with sticky action
Only color properties are shown, properties and rules are translated.
All properties are shown, properties and rules are translated.
All properties are shown, properties and rules are displayed as written in the stylesheet file itself.
Move cursor to start of line
Move cursor to end of line
Move cursor to start of page
Move cursor to end of page
Dynamic: Switch to emojis / Switch language
